issue.title: Remove the -destination id parameter when validating watchOS targets
issue.body:
As called out in #11558, publishing podspecs that support watchOS platform is currently broken under Xcode 14. Per the `xcodebuild` man page:

> To use a watchOS Simulator device as your destination ... specify the iOS Simulator platform destination that is paired with the watchOS Simulator device you want to use.

Not specifying any target and letting Xcode decide works well enough for now, though it won't have the same semantics of always choosing the oldest version available. This at least gets CocoaPods working again for pods that support watchOS.

Resolves #11558
